alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Montague; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:43PM CDT until May 04 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montague County in north central Texas... Northeastern Wise County in north central Texas... Northwestern Denton County in north central Texas... Southwestern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Alvord, or 13 miles north of Decatur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sanger, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Valley View, Leo, Lake Ray Roberts, Bolivar, Greenwood, Rosston, Slidell and Lois. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 473 and 483. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
